promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic boar steel-type pokemon with regal skin. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or boar. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Ironusk, a a chibi cute basic boar steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Energy Link. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "boar", "steel" or "Ironusk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, boar-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This petite, metallic swine thrives in mountainous habitats. Utilizing Energy Link, it magnetically charges its tusks to forage and playfully spar.
